answers.answer: you can try and take care of the headache the natural way, or at least lessen it. Try to stay hydrated with plenty of water, keep the room dark and also have it quiet. A cool pack/or wash cloth to put on your forehead may also help. Once you find something that kinda works for you, then stick with it.

question: I have had a severe headache for 3 days... they gave me tylenol, percocet, and vicadine...my headache did not cease or go away with any of these medications... they tested me for preeclampsia... I just want to know what should I do?? Only on eresult from the blood work was elevated but not enough to induce... I do not wish to take any more pain medicine ...please help me!!
title: severe headache at 36 weeks!
